data.actual_result: Discord loading animation is surrounded in the black box as a background.

data.short_description: Discord Loading Animation have a black box background instead of transparent (Mozilla FireFox or Microsoft Edge only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Mozilla FireFox or Microsoft Edge 17+- Go on Discordapp website - Log on - Observe as it loads
